name: Kled
title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
lore: A warrior as fearless as he is ornery, the yordle Kled embodies the furious bravado of Noxus. He is an icon beloved by the empire's soldiers, distrusted by its officers, and loathed by the nobility. Many claim Kled has fought in every campaign the legions have waged, has “acquired” every military title, and has never once backed down from a fight. Though the truth of the matter is often questionable, one part of his legend is undeniable: Charging into battle on his un-trusty steed, Skaarl, Kled fights to protect what's his… and to take whatever he can get.
blurb: A warrior as fearless as he is ornery, the yordle Kled embodies the furious bravado of Noxus. He is an icon beloved by the empire's soldiers, distrusted by its officers, and loathed by the nobility. Many claim Kled has fought in every campaign the...
allytips: Kled generates some courage by killing minions, but gets much more from fighting Champions.
The last hit of Violent Tendencies deals more damage than the first three - make sure you hit it!
Chaaaaaaaarge!!! can be cast at a great range. Try and predict where the enemy team will be by the time you reach them.
enemytips: Kled generates courage by damaging enemies with his Pocket Pistol and basic attacks, killing minions, and attacking structures or epic monsters.
Watch Kled's courage bar when he's off his mount - when it reaches 100%, he will remount and regain a significant amount of health.
Kled is much more threatening when he has Violent Tendencies ready.

riot_spells.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
riot_spells.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, yanks the enemy toward him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, slowing them by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and reducing incoming healing on them by {{ grievousamount*-100 }}% for {{ grievousduration }} seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

riot_spells.name: Violent Tendencies
riot_spells.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining {{ e2 }}% attack speed for four attacks or {{ e6 }} seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown.

The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e4 }} plus {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum health (maximum {{ e7 }} vs monsters).

riot_spells.name: Jousting
riot_spells.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

riot_spells.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
riot_spells.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ f5 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

riot_passive.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
riot_passive.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

wikia_champ.name: Kled
wikia_champ.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
wikia_champ.skill_i: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard;Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2;Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3

i1.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
i1.blurb: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.
i1.description: '''Kled''' is accompanied by his semi-trusty mount, '''Skaarl'''. Whether '''Kled''' is {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||mounted}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounted}}, his abilities are altered. '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' each have independent health bars with '''Skaarl''' being the only one benefiting from {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Mounted – Innate:}} While mounted all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by '''Skaarl'''. After being reduced to {{as|{{sti|health|0 health}}}} '''Skaarl''' flees and '''Kled''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounts}}, {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and briefly becoming {{tip|untargetable}}, with every damage in excess of '''Skaarl's''' {{as|{{sti|health}}}} being ignored.
i1.description3: {{sbc|Dismounted – Innate:}} '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|340+70*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, gains {{sti|range|125 range}} but his {{sti|ms|{{as|'''base''' movement speed}}}} is reduced by 60. While moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range he gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} but his basic attacks against them deal {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3||Courage}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||reunite}} again.
i1.description4: {{sbc|Courage - Innate:}} '''Kled''' restores 20 '''Courage''' whenever a champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 '''Courage''' for minion kills, 5 '''Courage''' when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] a structure or epic monster, and 15 '''Courage''' when basic attacking an enemy champion. At 100 '''Courage''', '''Skaarl''' returns to the fight with {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}}}}. While in base 25 '''Courage''' is regenerated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Returning to the base}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' and {{as|{{sti|health}}}}. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets '''Frayed Nerves''', meaning '''Kled''' will not be able to restore '''Skaarl's''' '''Courage''' for a brief period of time.
i1.description5: {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounting}} or {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismounting}} resets all of '''Kled's''' basic ability {{sti|cooldowns}} except for {{ai|Violent Tendencies|Kled}}.
i1.cooldown: {{tt|30 (On-Mount)|Cooldown begins on mounting-up and not when Skaarl flees away.}}
i1.notes:
* [[Decoy]]s are counted as champions for all of this ability's effects, other than the takedown one.
* '''Kled's''' health is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' is rounded down.
* The movement speed reduction is not affected by [[slow resist]].
* {{ii|Gargoyle Stoneplate}} can increase '''Kled's''' base health.
* It is possible to get the '''Courage''' from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* Health regeneration only regenerates '''Kled's''' or '''Skaarl's''' health, and not both's.

q1.name: Beartrap on a Rope
q1.blurb: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.
q1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' hurls a beartrap tied to a piece of rope in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through.
q1.leveling: {{st|Beartrap Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minions and Small Monsters Damage|{{ap|30*1.5 to 130*1.5}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.description2: {{tip|minion|Minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} take 50% increased damage. The bear trap stops at the first enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster hit, attaching to them. While attached, they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}}.
q1.description3: If '''Kled''' remains for {{fd|1.75}} seconds within a slowly decreasing radius of his target, he {{tip|airborne|pulls}} them {{tt|100|Estimated}}-units towards him, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, {{tip|Grievous Wounds|grievously wounding}} them by 60% for 5 seconds, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.leveling3:
{{st|Yank Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+60 to 130+260}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block ''Beartrap on a Rope's'' initial throw, but not its subsequent damage or pull.

q2.name: Pocket Pistol
q2.blurb: When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
q2.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.
q2.description2: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||Dismounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five {{as|pellets|buzzword2}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 250 units in the opposite direction.
q2.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q2.description3: {{as|Pellets|buzzword2}} collide into the first enemy they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
q2.notes:
* The knockback from ''Pocket Pistol'' can be used to pass through terrain.
* Casting Q during Kled's dismounting animation will buffer ''Pocket Pistol'' to cast when Kled lands. Casting Q during Kled's remounting animation will fire ''Pocket Pistol'' normally.

w1.name: Violent Tendencies
w1.blurb: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
w1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}
w1.cooldown: {{tt|{{ap|14 to 8}}|Starts after the attacks time out or are consumed.}}
w1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but the damage from Violent Tendencies is unaffected.
* As with most on-hit physical damage, ''Violent Tendencies'' bonus damage will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
* The base bonus damage will affect structures.

e1.name: Jousting
e1.blurb: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
e1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} towards him. This cannot cross terrain.
e1.description2: Upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} a fixed {{tt|200|estimated}}-units through them, marking them for 3 seconds and gaining {{tip|true sight}} of them. At the end of the {{tip|dash}} '''Kled''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second and the ability to ''{{tip|dash|joust}}'' through the marked target again. This subsequent pass can cross terrain.
e1.description3: The mark will remain even if the target dies.
e1.target_range: {{tt|550|first dash}} / {{tt|700|second dash, center to edge, estimated}}
e1.notes:
* ''Jousting's'' second dash will end prematurely if '''Kled''' leaves the dash range or is dismounted.
* If '''Kled''' re-casts the ability at its maximum range, it will go on cooldown without activating.

r1.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
r1.blurb: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
r1.description: {{sbc|{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||'''Mounted'''|link=Kled#Mounted}} - Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' charge {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} towards the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way.
r1.description2: While charging, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{sti|shield}} for every {{fd|0.25}} seconds of traveling, up to {{tt|{{as|950 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} over 3 seconds and {{pp|10|type=time traveling|key=%|label2=Shield Percentage|10 to 100|0 to 2.25|formula=('''maximum''' shield)/10*((time+0.25)/0.25). ''This is capped at 2.25 seconds of time active.''}} of the '''maximum''' shield amount over {{fd|2.25}} seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge.
r1.leveling2: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
r1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!||Mr. Kled's Wild Ride:}}}} The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds, that grants {{tt|{{as|650 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} to allied champions who follow the duo's path.
r1.description4: '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash|homes}} in on the first enemy champion encountered, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units and dealing {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|26|type=time traveling|key=%|label2=Damage Increase|0 to 200|0 to 4|formula=8% increase per 0.16 seconds. ''This is capped at 4 seconds of time active.''}}.
r1.leveling4: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4*3 to 6*3}}% {{as|(+ 12% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
r1.notes:
* During the charge the duo gain:
** (950{{minus}}({{tt|'''current''' movement speed|after movement speed soft caps}})){{divided by}}12{{times}}(time{{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} 
* The bonus movement speed is not affected by [[movement speed|movement speed caps]].
* The charge will not give any movement speed to '''Kled''' if he has more than {{tt|1440|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* The trail will not give '''Kled''' and his allies any movement speed if they have more than {{tt|840|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* All sections of the trail provide the same movement speed.
* Giving enough damage to make ''Kled'' dismount will cancel ''Chaaaaaaaarge!!!''.
* Enemies gain vision of ''Kled'' when he charges nearby.
